name: cpp-codelens
description: A VSCode extension that adds CodeLens to C++ files.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.emptyTe.description: Text displayed above an symbol when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.singula.description: Template text displayed above an symbol with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.pluralT.description: Template text displayed above an symbol with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.module..description: Enable or disable CodeLens for module symbol
Text displayed above an module when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an module with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an module with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.namespa.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for namespace symbol
Text displayed above an namespace when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an namespace with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an namespace with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.class.e.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for class symbol
Text displayed above an class when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.class.s.description: Template text displayed above an class with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.class.p.description: Template text displayed above an class with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.method..description: Enable or disable CodeLens for method symbol
Text displayed above an method when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an method with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an method with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.field.e.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for field symbol
Text displayed above an field when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.field.s.description: Template text displayed above an field with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.field.p.description: Template text displayed above an field with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.constru.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for field symbol
Text displayed above an constructor when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an constructor with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an constructor with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enum.en.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for enum symbol

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enum.em.description: Text displayed above an enum when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enum.si.description: Template text displayed above an enum with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enum.pl.description: Template text displayed above an enum with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.functio.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for function symbol
Text displayed above an function when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an function with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an function with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.variabl.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for variable symbol

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.functva.description: Text displayed above an variable when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.variabl.description: Template text displayed above an variable with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an variable with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.constan.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for constant symbol
Text displayed above an constant when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an constant with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an constant with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enumMem.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for enumMember symbol
Text displayed above an enumMember when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an enumMember with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an enumMember with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.struct..description: Enable or disable CodeLens for struct symbol
Text displayed above an struct when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an struct with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an struct with multiple references.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
